description: Ms Ripple`s Purrloin is a very smart and investigative Pok√©mon. When Cilan first saw it he was afraid of it as he has issues with Choroneko`s but after helping him with clues to solve the mystery of the stolen Lepardas` Eye, he was more friendly with Ms Ripple`s Purrloin.
name: Choroneko (Ms Ripple)
